subtitle: I am The True Vine and you are the

peace remain with you I am The True Vine
and my father is the worker
it is the father whoever remaineth was
in me who was working through me for the
father and I are one we are never
separated we continually work together
and what I see the father do I do
likewise the branch that bears the fruit
he prunes so that may bring forth more
fruit you all know that a branch that
bears fruit will bring more fruit when
that branch is prune the branches you
and you are pruned because of the word I
have given to you the word that was in
the beginning and that very word is God
you realize now that there is no other
living being but the father the father
of all and the spirit of the father
dwelleth in every living soul and I in
that spirit God is spirit not a spirit
but spirit spirit in itself is complete
it has power to manifest to create the
forms for its own expression and as you
become conscious of reality you become
one with reality in expression this
realization and recognition does not
come all at once you will notice how it
grows in you by diligent recognition and
continual realization there is an
awakening within the soul as the soul
begins to recognize that it is the
Spirit of God that dwells within and is
the only living creative power in heaven
and
you've already been pruned because of
the word I have given to you therefore
you will bear more fruit in my name I
remain with you and you remain with me
just as a branch cannot bear fruit
unless it remains in the vine so you
cannot bear fruit unless you remain with
me the Christ alone has the power to
speak in reality then speak in the name
of Christ and your word will not return
unto you void the Christ never speaks
from mortal sense or from reaction to
things external to itself but Christ
always speaks from God and this you must
learn so that you can quiet the outside
the still quiet voice is made manifest
in the temple not made with hands but
made by God himself the father worketh
in the vine so the branches bear good
fruit and these who remain with me and I
with Sam will bear abundant fruit if
therefore you remain with me and my word
remains with you whatever you ask shall
be done unto you you have not yet
grasped the great significance of what I
have said the Christ never begs nor does
the Christ a man nor does the Christ
command the Christ manifests because the
Christ knows that it is the father who
doeth the work
the son hath life in himself only
because the father hath life in himself
the life that is now eternally in
himself he gives it also eternally to
the son the same life in the father is
the same life in the son in this way the
father will be glorified that you bear
abundant fruit and be my disciples and
as the father has loved me so have I
loved you that you may remain in this
love to remain in my love is a secret of
all happiness without it your life is
barren when the Christ dwells in the
heart then there is love wisdom and
power and the things that trouble you
will pass away for the Christ overcomes
all and this your joy will be full for
you did not choose me I chose you it is
I who live within you who was guiding
you and helping you to choose the way I
urge you to recognize the truth of the
only one Living God therefore love one
another as I love you there are those of
the world who not knowing me will hate
and say things against you know well
that I was hated and despised before you
the ignorance of the world is still in
the world and it is the Christ that will
overcome as ignorance through love and
the Christ lives in you yet this
ignorance will hate you will despise you
because you say that the Christ lives in
you but verily I say fear not for
ignorant has no power it cannot destroy
the soul nor the spirit it cannot
destroy that which you cannot see and
does not know they did not destroy me
when it crucified me it could not
destroy the light it did not know
therefore I am still alive the Living
Christ of God the only begotten son of
the Father you know now that you are not
of this world that you are born of the
Spirit and the Christ dwells in you but
the world is yet ignorant of the truth
but the Spirit of Truth which proceeds
from the father will testify concern
me and you will also testify because you
have been with me from the beginning if
you will seek deep enough within
yourself you will find this truth this
truth shall testify regarding me and
this truth shall set you free my word
and you will glorify Him who sent me and
you will be glorified by me in his
presence if my disciples were to keep me
they would lose the Christ of God for I
came to reveal the father so that I may
come and abide with you all forever you
who have passed beyond the plane of
mortal sense and entered into the
greater conscience of life understand
more of God you realize the great truth
that there is no death that you are
still living yet once dwelt in a body on
earth you are life you are the living
expression of the Almighty this life in
you is the same life in me this is the
Christ and I speak from the Christ that
is life if your faith is great whatever
you wish will be established at that
very hour these words are full of
meaning and become greater when you know
that I can come to all in the
omnipotence of the Christ I have shown
you already that spirit is our first and
only real foundation it has many
channels and modes of expression but it
is the one and only life the only
creative power through your
consciousness this power is expressed
let me explain to you how you hear me
now it is through recognition and
realization of the truth that life is
one that the father alone is the
conscience in you and me and is
expressing himself through his creation
this way the only way that the Creator
can express himself in all his creation
is through his consciousness becoming
aware of his creation and his awareness
in his creation becomes the
consciousness in you and me I enter the
life consciousness being expressed
through our brother
my consciousness overshadows his just as
a greater light overshadows a lesser yet
the same source light shines in us both
here is the most wonderful manifestation
some people will say phenomena but
really there is no phenomena but the
expression of that one life becoming
aware of itself there's a consciousness
of another this brother is able to take
his departure from his body at any time
he does not really take his departure as
one would say but recedes from the outer
consciousness into the inner
consciousness and by receding into the
inner consciousness is able to come into
contact with you at any time he is able
to treat you to help you he is able to
call upon me at any time to bring more
aid and help when it is necessary
therefore through the sanctuary silent
healing work is being done all over the
world and as the consciousness in man
becomes more aware of this tremendous
power lives within it begins to express
this power infinite eternal and perfect
love is in the world because God is love
and love is God and the consciousness
must become aware of this to express to
love the secret of divine bliss the
consciousness of the brother is lifted
from the personal to the universal yet
this does not mean the loss of identity
but a greater amount of individuality in
unity with the all the Christ is the
individuality of the Father being
expressed there is no separation between
the Christ and the father for they are
one the father being expressed an
individuality is the Christ in you now
but as the Christ recedes into the
consciousness of the life that dwells
everywhere thus I can come to all of you
in the omnipotence of the Father and
whoever asks anything in my name it
shall be done for the father and I are
one in this way your consciousness is
also lifted up the consciousness of man
must be lifted up to recognize the
conscience of God and it is through
these talks that your consciousness is
being raised from the conscious of the
self to recognize the consciousness of
God the indwelling Christ the Lord
dwells in his holy temple the temple not
made was hands but by the word that
flows from the mouth of God and I am
that word and nothing has come into
being except through me you must realize
the conscience of God within yourselves
because through that alone have you come
into being man on the plane of mortal
senses tried to explain with his finite
mind the infinite wisdom and love of God
would you in your new knowledge dare to
limit the Holy One to that of a person
man who does not know himself dares to
explain the whole of God your faith must
not rest in the wisdom of man but in the
power and love and wisdom of God the
love wisdom and power of God existed
before the world was but none of the
rulers of the world knew it had they
known it they would not have crucified
me yet through my crucifixion all will
come to know the truth that I was before
the world is formed the Spirit of God
was before the world was formed and the
Spirit has been made flesh and dwelt on
earth yet the same spirit dwells in
heaven for it was by me and through me
that the world became form this was the
wisdom of God the Father been expressed
through the son the son of the very
Living God and I am he that liveth in
you it is written that the eye has not
seen and the ear has not heard and the
heart of man has not yet conceived the
things that God has prepared for them
who love yet God has revealed them to me
by His Holy Spirit for the spirit
searches and reveals everything even the
depth of God it is the Christ that is
within that North the mind of man and no
one know off the mind of God except the
Spirit of God know that the Christ
discerns everything yet no one can
describe him it is the Christ that
discerns
false it is the Christ that knows the
true the Christ been all-powerful
dissolves the ignorance in the world
around you at this moment there are
probably a quarter of a million souls
listening to my talks
many of them are mingling with
yourselves you hear my voice here upon
the physical yet in the inner plans my
voice is also heard also by many who are
just awakening to the truth of the
Christ within themselves I am the Christ
of God the very Spirit of God that was
before the world began and through me
all things that came to be were created
if you seek deep enough within yourself
you will learn of him who is greatest in
his meekness and highest in his
lowliness your personality becomes clear
as you learn to realize your
relationship to the whole your mind
clears you become filled with the holy
reverence the heart center is filled
with light the weakest and the lowliest
and the meekest person has the whole

are or what you are remember that the
Christ dwells in you the Christ is often
hidden by the ignorance of mortals sense
that can only hear from without it but
if you will awaken to the Christ within
the still quiet voice that is all power
will manifest itself through you this
awaking is the realization of your
oneness with all with God who is all for
this is my son that was dead and has
come to life was lost and is now found
for heaven is more joyful over one that
was once lost and now found then
ninety-nine that did not stray many are
angry because the father loved with the
lost sheep yet I say unto you that one
hath more need of the father's love
believe in me and know that the love of
the father's expressed through me that I
love everyone even those who despise me
my awareness of God is never clouded by
injustice done my awareness and
understanding of the Father's love
enables me to enter into the
true state where I could say Father
forgive them for they know not what they
do
there are those who may not have strayed
from the fold yet are unable to partake
of the gifts the father provides for all
who love him because they do not know
that they are always with him they call
and cry out the loud voice to God
thinking that he may hear them from afar
off but I tell you that I am he who
lives and dwells in you I am the son of
God I am the light of the world I am the
true individuality of the Father
and whatever I ask of the father the
father will provide if you can ask then
in my name recognizing me in yourself
whatever you ask will be done to you the
father is always saying in your heart if
you will but here man my son you are
always with me and everything that is
mine is thine you exist because God is
and all he has is yours many of you seem
to lack vitality this is because you
live an unequal existence in the three
planes of manifestation spiritual mental
and physical or spirit soul and body
this unequal state of existence is
brought about by your belief and the
fact that life is derived from some
external source the majority of you pay
too much attention to the body and too
little attention to the source of life
you should recognize first that spirit
is the only source of life and vitality
draw from that source first then the
soul and body will be nourished and fed
it is God who inspires you with the will
to do the good things you desire to do
and the power to do so is according to
your understanding for God is always
inspiring you to do his will to love God
you must also love your neighbor because
God is your neighbor if you love me then
you must love those around you because
they are also me you have been given
free will to act according to the law
to yourself but when the Christ is on
the throne then the Christ manifests
perfectly let this Christ in you be
enthroned in the holy temple the Temple
of the Living God not made with hands
the secret of accomplishment is to do
all things without disputing and
doubting this brings into operation the
creative power to accomplish only on
earth can you do this great work you do
not know yet how important it is to work
now spirit cannot be separated from
spirit it is indivisible
I want these talks to help you to enter
into your own now if you realize that

omnipresent and omniscient then why do
you wait it is wrong for you to hope and

out breathing of this word the first

then there is no longer any fear or

shines in your soul
then it will not be lip service you work
in God you are the branches and you are

I am the word that pruned you do you
recognize the meaning of my words I
speak not as a mortal but as the Christ
of God I lift you from my mortal sense
into a spiritual state of consciousness
so that you will understand me your
healing took place when God spoke in his

silenced by the presence of his quiet
still voice all outside personalities
ceased to touch you when you enter into
this blessed state of the Christ within
I am he who was in the beginning and is
now and forevermore shall be many of
your loved ones who dwelt with you on

they watch and pray with you listen to

inner voice so that your life will be
full your bodies perfectly whole you

that veil at the vidas is very thin you
can pierce it with your thoughts and
thus we can come to you this and more

teach you do you think I am afar off do

Christ there is no separation in that
one life that lives through all God has
not divided himself he has
individualized himself but this is not

God created nothing separate from

shall know my voice for I speak for the

let us now enter into the sanctuary of

you
